question: Is Chilled Grilled Chicken Sub Sandwich packaged according to requirements?
findings: Sub not rolled in parchment paper
Sub not cut at 45° angle
Parchment paper torn/wrinkled/dirty
Scraps of parchment paper hanging from sub
Ends of parchment paper not folded in neatly
Parchment paper too loose
Ingredients/scraps visible between baguette and parchment paper
No label
Label not legible
Label not secured properly
Parchment paper too tight

question: Is internal product temperature of grilled chicken slices in sub 40°F (4.44°C) or lower? (Test 2 slices of chicken on 1 sub)
findings: Internal temperature of chicken slices above 40°F (4.44°C); Slice 1: 45°F (7.22°C), Slice 2: 43°F (6.11°C)

question: Are ingredients layered in the correct order?
findings: Ingredients not layered in the correct order

question: Do grilled chicken slices meet requirements?
findings: No grilled chicken slices
Clumped/not spread evenly
Slices less than ⅛” thick
Slices more than ⅛” thick
Gray blood spots in chicken
Undercooked (red/pink areas)

findings: Timer device not set correctly for chicken filets
Timer device not set correctly for spicy filets
Timer device not set correctly for Nuggets
Timer device not set correctly for Strips

Timer device not set correctly for Grilled Nuggets

question: Is marked sandwich served or removed by end of holding time?
findings: Held past end of 20 minute holding time
Other

question: Are 5-count Grilled Nuggets packaged in a #4 paper bowl with lid?
findings: Incorrect bowl/packaging

Not served with fork

question: Is parfait lid handled in a food safe manner?
findings: Inside of lid touched with hand/fingers
Lid placed face down with inside touching surface

question: Is correct portion of Oreo® cookie crumbs added to Greek Yogurt Parfait?
